I was wandering around the market at lunchtime and decided to drop in here for a bite to eat because the menu looked good and it was reasonably priced.  I sat at the bar and the service was very friendly.  I ordered the grilled clams for 7,50 and they were amazing!  She also brought a side of tomato bread which was great with the clams. I sat next to 2 couples from NYC who had eaten there the day before and came back because they loved it so much.  They had some "items of the day"--veal and a fish dish covered with onions and currants. He said the veal was amazing and she said the fish was just ok.  They have items on their hot bar where you can see them under the glass at the counter.  I would definitely recommend this place especially for seafood since it is in the market!
